productList.productSubDesc: Emulsifying agent, humectant and conditioner in skin and hair care
productList.productDesc: Countra Mix can be used as an emulsifying agent, humectant and conditioner in skin and hair care. Countra Mix is vegetable derived and can be used in creams, lotions, facial cleansers, and bath products such as bath butters and scrubs. White beeswax is a chemically bleached form of yellow wax and is used in similar applications: for example, to increase the consistency of creams and ointments, and to stabilize water-in-oil emulsions.

comments.name: Mary Cruz
comments.comment: This cream is truly a game-changer! I've been using it for a few weeks now, and I've noticed a remarkable difference in the texture and appearance of my skin. It feels smoother, looks more radiant, and has become an essential part of my daily skincare routine. I couldn't be happier with the results!
